pages.text: $(li)Minecart with TNT are a new variant of the common Minecart.$(br)$(li)The TNT contained in the Minecart will detonated if one of the following conditions is met:
$(li)If it moves over a Activator Rail$(br)$(li)If it is destroyed while in motion$(br)$(li)If it is destroyed by fire, lava, or an explosion$(br)$(li)If it is hit by a Fire Charge.
